thread.title: Steve Kerr fired up after pair of fouls, gets tossed
thread.title_full: Steve Kerr fired up after pair of fouls, gets tossed

author: Ron Clements (us-editorial@performgroup.com)
title: Steve Kerr fired up after pair of fouls, gets tossed
text:
NBA February 5, 2017 12:32am EST February 5, 2017 12:32am EST Basketball, NBA, News, Golden State Warriors, Sacramento Kings, English, Draymond Green It's not too often you see Steve Kerr lose his cool, but the Warriors coach nearly blew a gasket Saturday night. Steve Kerr (Getty Images) 
Updated at 12:32 a.m. ET 
Updated at 12:32 a.m. ET 
It's not too often you see Steve Kerr lose his cool, but the Warriors coach nearly blew a gasket Saturday night. 
Kerr was upset with officials during the third quarter of Saturday's game in Sacramento following a pair of questionable loose-ball fouls called on Warriors forward Kevon Looney. 
MORE: Klay Thompson to defend his title as the 3-point contest title 
Looney was whistled for the second time in the span of 20 seconds following a missed layup by Kevin Durant. That prompted Draymond Green to say something to the referee, who then issued a technical foul to Green.Â 
That's when Kerr lost it, storming onto the court with a few colorful words for the official, who T-d up the Warriors coach before sending him on his way.Â Read This
